componentDescription: ## ARIA If the progress bar is describing the loading progress of a particular region of a page, you should use aria-describedby to point to the progress bar, and set the aria-busy attribute to true on that region until it has finished loading.

propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.value: The value of the progress indicator for the determinate and buffer variants. Value between 0 and 100.
propDescriptions.valueBuffer: The value for the buffer variant. Value between 0 and 100.
propDescriptions.variant: The variant to use. Use indeterminate or query when there is no progress value.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

colorPrimary.description: Styles applied to the root and bar2 element if {{conditions}}.

colorSecondary.description: Styles applied to the root and bar2 elements if {{conditions}}.

determinate.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

indeterminate.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

buffer.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

query.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

dashed.description: Styles applied to the additional bar element if {{conditions}}.

dashedColorPrimary.description: Styles applied to the additional bar element if {{conditions}}.

dashedColorSecondary.description: Styles applied to the additional bar element if {{conditions}}.

bar.description: Styles applied to the layered bar1 and bar2 elements.

barColorPrimary.description: Styles applied to the bar elements if {{conditions}}.

barColorSecondary.description: Styles applied to the bar elements if {{conditions}}.

bar1Indeterminate.description: Styles applied to the bar1 element if {{conditions}}.

bar1Determinate.description: Styles applied to the bar1 element if {{conditions}}.

bar1Buffer.description: Styles applied to the bar1 element if {{conditions}}.

bar2Indeterminate.description: Styles applied to the bar2 element if {{conditions}}.

bar2Buffer.description: Styles applied to the bar2 element if {{conditions}}.
